-OOC- Okay I got permission from two of my buddies who
have enlisted to debute thier characters in the next
series of messages until they get fully apporved!-

  "Indeed you do get down to business," Panzertron
said taping a switch on the control board. He stepped
away from it, "If it was my call I'd make the
descicion. You were the first to respond and show up.
I-"

  The bridge door hissed open. A large transformer
entered the bridge, he was accompanied by a smaller
skeletal robot.

   "His call isn't important here Megatron," the robot
said," Mine is. The name is General Allitron."

   The skinny robot walked over to Panzertron.

  "Commander Pestilance, go scout the island and
report what you find." Panzertron said.

  "Yesss sssir." Pestilance said.

   Pestilance exited through one of the wing bridges
and jumped into the air. With a flurry of clicks the
transformer changed into a chopper and buzzed away
rapidly.

  Allitron watched Pestilance leave, "Alright Megatron
what would our little alliance gain us?"
